titles.title: My soul escaped like a bird,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My soul escaped like a bird,
Out of the snare of the fowler;
My soul escaped like a bird,
Out of the snare of the fowler.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The snare is broken and we are escaped,
Our help is in the name of the Lord!
The snare is broken and we are escaped,
Our help is in the name of the Lord!
